interface.name: certwatach_run
interface.summary: Execute certwatch in the certwatch domain, and allow the specified role the certwatch domain, and use the caller's terminal. Has a sigchld backchannel.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the certwatch domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the certwatch domain to use.
